hero_desc: Tukuuma enkola ey'omweru era esingako mu kuyingiza abayizi ba O-Level (S.1) ne A-Level (S.5). Okusaba kwonna kukolwako ng'okulandira bwe kuli, okusinziira ku bifo ebisigalawo mu kibiina.
procedure_subtitle: Omutendera omutegeke obulungi okuva ku kubuuza okutuuka ku kuwandiisibwa.
requirements_subtitle: Okukakasa omweru mu nkola y'okukakasa buli asaba.
eligibility_li1: Abayizi balina okuba nga baamaliriza dda omutendera ogukkakkanya ogw'okusoma (Primary 7 ku ba S.1, S.4 ku ba S.5).
eligibility_li2: Abayizi abajja okuva mu masomero amalala balina okukakasibwa okusinziira ku ngeri gye basomyemu n'okubuzibwabuzibwa ekitongole ky'emisomo.
eligibility_li3: Abasaba bonna balina okujjira wamu n'omuzadde oba omuvunaanyizibwa mu kukkirizibwa.

tracker.title: Goberera Okusaba Kwo
tracker.desc: Wandiika namba yo ey'enjawulo ey'ebitabo 8 okukebera we kutuuse.
tracker.error_not_found: Tewali kusaba kulabiddwa ku namba eyo. Kebera oba namba ntuufu oguuddemu nate.
tracker.error_generic: Wabaddewo kiremya mu kufuna amawulire. Gezaako nate mu maaso.
tracker.status_rejected: Twembi tukkirizza nti okusaba kwo tekuwedde bulungi.
tracker.status_review: Okusaba kwo kukyalowoozebwako abali mu kuyingiza abayizi.
tracker.status_pending: Okusaba kwo kufuniddwa era kulindiridde okukeberwa.
tracker.accepted_note: Kebera email yo oba nno funa ebbaluwa yo ey'okuyingira okuva mu ofiisi enkulu.

form.title: Okusaba ku Mutimbagano
form.subtitle: Jjuza fomu eno wansi okusaba okuyingira.
form.success_desc: Weebale kusaba kuyingira mu Bugisu High School. Okusaba kwo kufuniddwa era kukyalowoozebwako.
form.ref_note: Siga namba eno okusobola okugoberera enkola y'okuyingira kwo.
form.contact_note: Tujja kutuukirira omuzadde/omuvunaanyizibwa wo mangu ddala.

dates.title: Ennaku Enkulu & Ebiseera
dates.subtitle: Manya ebiseera ebikulu ebikwata ku kuyingira kw'omwaka {{year}}.
dates.note: Weetegereze: Ennaku ziyinza okukyuka okusinziira ku biragiro by'Ekitongole ky'Ebyenjigiriza.

support.title: Obuyambi mu Kuyingira
support.subtitle: Olina ebibuuzo ebinjawulo? Abavunaanyizibwa ku kuyingira bayizi weebali okukuyamba mu nkola eno yonna.

inquiry.title: Okubuuza okw'angu
inquiry.subtitle: Tonnabera mwetegefu kusaba kwonna? Laga okwagala kwo oba buuza ekibuuzo wano.
inquiry.received_desc: Weebale kwagala kuyingira mu Bugisu High School. Abakulu baffe bajja kuddamu ekibuuzo kyo mangu ddala.
inquiry.message_placeholder: Tutegeeze ku mwana wo oba buuza ekibuuzo kyennyini...

resources.title: Eby'okukozesa n'Okuggyako
resources.subtitle: Ebiwandiiko ebikulu ebisobola okukuyamba mu kusaba kwo.
